DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Acupuncture may help relieve pain dysfunction cause cancer surgery . It yet know whether acupuncture effective standard therapy treat pain dysfunction patient undergone neck surgery head neck cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized phase III trial study acupuncture see well work compare standard therapy treat pain dysfunction patient undergone neck surgery head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Standard Therapy Treating Pain Dysfunction Patients Who Have Undergone Neck Surgery Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine whether acupuncture reduces pain dysfunction patient head neck cancer undergone neck dissection . Secondary - Determine whether acupuncture relieve dry mouth patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , control study . Patients stratify accord surgical procedure ( selective neck dissection v modify radical neck dissection v radical neck dissection ) baseline Constant-Murley score ( ≤ 35 v > 35 ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo acupuncture 20-30 minute weekly 4 week . - Arm II : Patients undergo standard care 4 week . In arm , treatment continue absence unacceptable toxicity . The Constant-Murley score assess baseline week 6 . Pain medication use record baseline , study treatment , week 6 . Numerical Rating Scale pain activity xerostomia inventory complete baseline week 5 6 . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 58 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Must undergo neck dissection cancer ≥ 3 month ago ( order qualify pain chronic sequella ) Subjective complaint pain and/or dysfunction neck and/or shoulder , opinion investigator , due neck dissection ConstantMurley score ≤ 70 ( i.e. , moderate severe pain dysfunction ) No moderate severe neck shoulder pain , opinion investigator , due cancer surgery PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics At least 3 month since prior radiotherapy More 6 week since prior acupuncture Concurrent analgesic allow
